diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Primary hypertrophic cardiomyopathy associated with JAK2 mutation V617F
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis of primary hypertrophic cardiomyopathy was confirmed through autopsy which revealed symmetric cardiac hypertrophy. JAK2 mutation V617F was detected in approximately 50% of DNA from atrial and ventricular cardiomyocytes, indicating a functional link between the mutation and myocardial hypertrophy.
